body.name: The Darkest Minds Series Boxed Set [4-Book Paperback Boxed Set]-The Darkest Minds (A Darkest Minds Novel)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Flipping The Pages LLC and Fulfilled by Amazon.
editorialReviews: Editorial Reviews About the Author Alexandra Bracken is the #1 New York Times bestselling author of The Darkest Minds series. Born and raised in Arizona, she moved East to study history and English at the College of William & Mary in Virginia. After working in publishing for several years, Alex now writes full-time and can be found hard at work on her next novel in a charming little home that's perpetually overflowing with books. Visit her online at www.alexandrabracken.com and on Twitter @alexbracken.

body.description: All four novels in the New York Times best-selling Darkest Minds series--The Darkest Minds, Never Fade, In the Afterlight, and Through the Dark--are now available in one thrilling paperback boxed set. With gorgeous, fresh designs and exclusive bonus short stories from the perspectives of fan-favorite characters Liam, Vida, and Clancy, this collection will delight loyal fans and new readers alike, just in time for the major motion picture starring Amandla Stenberg and Mandy Moore.Praise for the Darkest Minds series:"Meet your next dystopian obsession"--Entertainment Weekly"Haunting... Bracken creates a gripping and terrifying dystopian world."--Kirkus Reviews"Heart-wrenching but completely riveting, this novel pulls no punches."--BCCB"A riveting, emotional read that kept me on edge!"--New York Times best-selling author Melissa Marr. Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a little messed up.
reviews.reviewText: The books themselves are great but there was some damage done. I don't know if it was from transit or if they were just like that but it's nothing to bad. I do have to say the other book that I ordered and it was delivered with was perfectly fine so I don't really know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite book series
reviews.reviewText: The absolute best, it’s never boring!! Definitely not for younger teens as there’s quite a bit of violence and it can be graphic, there’s also some romance and making out and all that jazz but definitely my favorite book series

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great series but got to be a hassle to read
reviews.reviewText: All in all, the author did an amazing job. I think that many readers will really enjoy it, but for me, there just wasn't enough character development and I just kept hoping to see that from Ruby but never did. I feel like the characters just always wanted to do something to change the whole mess, but it got to a point where it was unnecessary and it was almost as if they wanted to prove something that wasn't needed.The action in this book was beautifully written and the emotional drama was great.The book that, I would have to say, had me captured and wanted to read more, was the novella series/the last book in this series. I feel like the author had really gotten into the shoes of the different characters and really portrayed that matter. I felt attached to these characters and actually got to feel how they felt during the series that wasn't included then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Came in exactly as is, it’s paperback, good and sturdy. The case for the books it self is a bit flimsy but good nonetheless. Watched the movie and just had to read the full series!

I loved that all of the books in this series came in order of the box set. I can't ever put it down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Bought as present for granddaughter as part of list of books she wanted. Arrived in quick time and in excellent condition of brand new.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein Muss für alle Fans von Dystopien!
reviews.reviewText: Wirklich tolle Buchserie! Ein Muss für alle Fans von Dystopien. Auch von Nicht Muttersprachlern gut zu lesen. :)

Si vous avez aimé Divergent ou Hunger Games, vous apprécierez sûrement aussi cette série. Les personnages sont attachants (même si l'héroïne est le personnage le plus énervant de toute la série), et l'histoire ne manque pas d'intrigues. On reste accroché jusqu'à la fin. Through the dark est une chouette addition avec trois petites histoires en complément de la série.
